product_name: The North Face Blaze Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Blaze Triclimate 3-in-1 jacket features a waterproof, breathable shell and zip-in insulated liner for maximum versatility and temperature regulation in a wide variety of conditions. Cold and wet out? Wear both the shell and liner for maximum warmth and protection. When it's wet and mild, wear the FlashDry(TM) 2.5-layer shell on its own. When it's dry and cool, wear just the zip-in quilted FlashDry(TM) insulated liner. Attached adjustable hood; pit-zips; hem cinch-cord. The North Face Blaze Triclimate 3-in-1 jacket features 2 zippered hand pockets and an inner media pocket.
short_description: The North Face Blaze Triclimate 3-in-1 jacket features a waterproof, breathable shell and zip-in insulated liner for maximum versatility and temperature regulation in a wide variety of conditions.
